title: Saint? No, Just a Passing Monster Tamer!
description:
Genres: Seinen, Adaptation, Comedy, Fantasy, Adventure, Isekai, Animals, Magic
Content Rating - Safe

Japanese Title: 聖女さま？ いいえ、通りすがりの魔物使いです！ ～絶対無敵の聖女はモフモフと旅をする～
Romaji Title: Seijo-sama? Iie, Toorisugari no Mamono Tsukai desu! ~Zettai Muteki no Seijo wa mofumofu to Tabi o suru~
English full title: Saint? No, Just a Passing Monster Tamer! ~The Completely Unparalleled Saint Travels with Fluffies~

 Synopsis:
Kanata has always loved animals, however they've always feared her. In her young mind, she made a resolution. If getting close to animals was impossible, then all she had to do was become a monster tamer. Then, she'd finally be able to pet them to her heart's content. She worked with all her might to become one in the future... to the point it would be considered overkill.

The story of Kanata, 15 years old, as she becomes the strongest monster tamer while traveling together with her fluffy companions.
author: Inumajin

1.title: Sage, Hero, Saint? No, I've Already Set My Mind On My Job Class!

2.title: A Furball Cat? No, It's Demon Lord Zagugiel!

3.title: Dragon Extermination? No, Simply Herb Harvesting!

4.title: Evil Spirit Dispersion? No, Just Sewage Cleaning!
